segments.text: My eyes drift to the window above the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks absolutely pristine and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a neat path and lovely low bushes, everything in its place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the chaos inside is quite stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if two different worlds exist within one frame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of how much water is being wasted here is just disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the potential damage to this lovely kitchen!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised by how calm the outside world appears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's unsettling to see such a disconnect between environments.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden makes the interior mess even more jarring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach in and turn off that faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes me feel a bit uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR
